genresAdvancedInfo.name: harsh noise wall
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Harsh Noise Wall is a subgenre of noise music that is characterized by its extreme volume and intensity. It is created by layering multiple layers of distorted sounds and feedback, creating a wall of sound that is both chaotic and hypnotic. The music is often abrasive and challenging, and is meant to push the boundaries of what is considered music. Harsh Noise Wall is not for everyone, but for those who enjoy it, it can be a truly immersive and intense experience.
